mapper.insert: INSERT INTO personnel_attendance_group ( group_id, group_name, default_on_time, default_off_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time, alive_flag ) VALUES ( UUID(), #{groupName}, #{defaultOnTime}, #{defaultOffTime}, #{createUserId}, #{createUserName}, NOW(), '1' )
mapper.select:
SELECT group_id AS groupId, group_name AS groupName, default_on_time AS defaultOnTime, default_off_time AS defaultOffTime, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_user_name AS createUserName, create_time AS createTime, update_user_id AS updateUserId, update_user_name AS updateUserName, update_time AS updateTime, alive_flag AS aliveFlag FROM personnel_attendance_group WHERE alive_flag = '1'
AND group_id = #{groupId}
AND group_name LIKE (${groupName})
AND group_id IN( SELECT attendance_group_id FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} )
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM user_info WHERE attendance_group_id = #{groupId} AND alive_flag = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE personnel_attendance_group SET update_time = NOW(), update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_user_name = #{updateUserName}, alive_flag = '0' WHERE alive_flag = '1' AND group_id = #{groupId}
UPDATE user_info SET update_time = NOW(), update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_user_name = #{updateUserName}, attendance_group_id = #{groupId} WHERE alive_flag = '1' AND user_id IN (${userIds})
